headline: Is Brown & Brown (BRO) Mispriced After A 39% One Year Share Price Decline?
summary: For investors wondering whether Brown & Brown, at around US$71.82, is offering fair value or a potential opportunity, this article walks through what the current price might really imply. The stock has recently shown mixed returns, with a 3.2% gain over the last 7 days, a 0.4% decline over 30 days, a 7.5% decline year to date, and a 39.0% decline over 1 year. The 3 year and 5 year figures sit at 29.1% and 61.4% respectively. Recent news coverage has largely focused on Brown & Brown in the...

headline: Brown & Brown (BRO) Seen Well Positioned Amid Limited AI Disruption Risk, Mizuho Says
summary: Brown & Brown, Inc. (NYSE:BRO) is included among the 13 Best Income Stocks with Highest Upside Potential. On February 27, Mizuho upgraded Brown & Brown, Inc. (NYSE:BRO) to Outperform from Neutral. It raised the stock’s price target to $85 from $84. The firm made the change after adjusting ratings across the insurance property and casualty […]

headline: Assessing Brown & Brown (BRO) Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: Why Brown & Brown is on investors’ radar today Brown & Brown (BRO) is drawing attention after recent share price moves that leave the stock with mixed short term returns, including a roughly 1% decline over the past month and an 11% decline in the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Brown & Brown. At a share price of $71.82, Brown & Brown’s recent 1-day and 7-day share price returns of 0.84% and 3.20% contrast with weaker year to date and 1-year total shareholder returns. This suggests...
